title: Channel Islands National Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning          This page is dedicated to providing the public with information on planning activities and projects within Channel Islands National Park and how to stay involved in the planning process.   Please click on the links below to learn more about these planning activities and projects.       Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Channel Islands National Park.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.      Plans in Progress  Telecommunication Project Scorpion Anchorage Pier Replacement      Completed Planning Projects  General Management Plan 2015 General Management Plan 1980 (Natural and Cultural Resource Management)   General Management Plan 1985 (Visitor Use, Interpretation, General Development)Environmental Assessment for General Management Plan 1985   Anacapa Island Restoration Plan   Business Plan   Santa Cruz Island Primary Restoration Plan   Santa Rosa Island Resources Management Plan   Prisoners Harbor Coastal Wetland Restoration Project Final Environmental Impact Statement   Rehabilitate Failing Santa Rosa Island PierManagement of Non-native Argentine Ants from Santa Cruz Island
